item.title: Pointing the Way to Serverless Python
item.description: Takeaways Today we’re going to look at running up the world’s simplest Flask app using Cloud Run. You’ll learn: How Google Cloud Run makes hosting apps delightfully easy How to write a simple Dockerfile to run your application in Cloud Run How you can leverage Waypoint to make development simple To skip to the end there’s a reference GitHub repository here The What & Why of Waypoint What is Waypoint In October 2020, Hashicorp announced Waypoint, a new way to simplify your development process.
